languages.text: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
languages.original_text: Использование сопровождается ослепляющей вспышкой света и громким взрывом. Существа в области действия выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} на 1 ход, а в случае успеха получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Stuns targets within the area for 1 round if they fail Toughness test.
On a successful test the target becomes perplexed for 1 round.

The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

Emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty, or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures become {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

languages.text: Использование сопровождается ослепляющей вспышкой света и громким взрывом. Существа в области действия выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} на 1 ход, а в случае успеха получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.
languages.original_text: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Все цели в области действия проходят проверку Выносливости и в случае провала оказываются оглушены на 1 раунд.
В случае успеха цель оказывается в замешательстве на 1 раунд.

Все цели в области действия проходят проверку Выносливости и в случае провала оказываются оглушены на 1 раунд.
В случае успеха цель оказывается в замешательстве на 1 раунд.

Использование сопровождается ослепляющей вспышкой света и громким взрывом. Существа в области действия выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со штрафом −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} на 1 ход, а в случае успеха получают {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 这颗手雷爆炸时会发出刺眼的闪光与震耳欲聋的爆炸声。区域内所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}减值。若未能通过检定，则会{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一轮；若成功通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这颗手雷爆炸时会发出刺眼的闪光与震耳欲聋的爆炸声。区域内所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}减值。若未能通过检定，则会{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一轮；若成功通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态，持续一轮。

手雷会发出刺眼的闪光，爆发出和巨大的爆炸声。区域内所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受额外{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}。若未能通过检定，则会{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}轮{/g}。通过检定的生物会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: La granada emite un destello cegador y un estallido ensordecedor. Las criaturas alcanzadas por el estallido deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} durante 1 turno. Si superan la prueba, las criaturas sufren +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejas{/g}.
languages.original_text: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La granada emite un destello cegador y un estallido ensordecedor. Las criaturas alcanzadas por el estallido deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} durante 1 turno. Si superan la prueba, las criaturas sufren +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejas{/g}.

Emite un destello cegador y un estallido ensordecedor. Las criaturas alcanzadas por el estallido deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Si superan la prueba, las criaturas quedan {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejas{/g}. Se acumula.

languages.text: グレネードはまばゆい閃光と大きな爆発音を放つ。爆発に巻き込まれたクリーチャーは、−{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を成功させなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}に1ターンの間なる。抵抗判定に成功した場合、クリーチャーは+１スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: グレネードはまばゆい閃光と大きな爆発音を放つ。爆発に巻き込まれたクリーチャーは、−{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を成功させなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}に1ターンの間なる。抵抗判定に成功した場合、クリーチャーは+１スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}状態になる。

まばゆい光と大きな爆発音を放つ。爆発に巻き込まれたクリーチャーは、−{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}がある{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を成功しなければならない。失敗すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。判定に成功すると、クリーチャーは{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}状態になる。蓄積可能。

languages.text: Die Granate erzeugt einen gleißenden Blitz und einen lauten Knall. Von der Explosion erfasste Kreaturen müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden. Im Falle einer erfolgreichen Probe wird die Kreatur mit +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Granate erzeugt einen gleißenden Blitz und einen lauten Knall. Von der Explosion erfasste Kreaturen müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden. Im Falle einer erfolgreichen Probe wird die Kreatur mit +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} belegt.

Stößt einen blendenden Lichtblitz und eine laute Explosion aus. In dieser Explosion gefangene Kreaturen müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} bestehen, oder sie sind für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}. Bei einer bestandenen Probe ist das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}überrascht{/g}. Addiert sich.

languages.text: La grenade émet une lueur aveuglante et une explosion assourdissante. Les créatures prises dans l'explosion doivent réaliser un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 tour. En cas de réussite, elles subissent +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
languages.original_text: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La grenade émet une lueur aveuglante et une explosion assourdissante. Les créatures prises dans l'explosion doivent réaliser un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}. En cas d'échec, elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} pendant 1 tour. En cas de réussite, elles subissent +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.

Émet une lueur aveuglante et une explosion assourdissante. Les créatures prises dans l'explosion doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. En cas de réussite du test, les créatures subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Cumulable.

La grenade émet une lueur aveuglante et une explosion assourdissante. Les créatures prises dans l'explosion doivent réaliser un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4}. En cas d'échec, elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} pendant 1 tour. En cas de réussite, elles subissent +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.

languages.text: Bomba, gürültüyle patlayarak kör edici bir ışık parlaması yayar. Bu patlamaya yakalanan yaratıklar, −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 1 turluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}. Yaratıklar, testi geçmeleri hâlinde ise +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalırlar.

Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
